jobDescription: Snap Inc. is a camera company. We believe that reinventing the camera represents our greatest opportunity to improve the way people live and communicate. Our products empower people to express themselves, live in the moment, learn about the world, and have fun together.  Were looking for a Data Scientist to join Snap Inc! Working closely with the Engineering, Product Design, and Product Management teams, you will create inventive, data-based approaches to solving difficult business problems.
